page.title: 19KENILWORTH CASTLE (CONT)
page.content: {DESCRIPTION OF THE CASTLE.}THE CASTLE IS MAINLY IN RUINS BUT IT IS STILL AN IMPRESSIVE SIGHT. THE GATEHOUSE IS IN VERY GOOD CONDITION AND IS USED FOR SOME COUNCIL MEETINGS AND OTHER TOWN FUNCTIONS.THE TUDOR STABLE BUILT BY THE EARL OF LEICESTER HAVE RECENTLY BEEN RENOVATED. AT THE PRESENT TIME THERE IS A MUSEUM IN THE BARN GIVING INFORMATION ABOUT THE CASTLE.THE GREAT HALL STILL HAS ITS ORIGINAL OUTER WALLS BUT THERE IS NO ROOF. { KENILWORTH CASTLE } COLD ATMOSPHERE AND SMELLS, ANCIENT WALLS AND DOORWAYS. SPOOKY DARKNESS IN THE DUNGEONS, THE AFTERNOON DRAWS ON. LINGERING SMELLS AND MUSTY AIR, ECHOS GROW LOUD AND THEN FADE IN THE WALLS. SHONA HEATH AGED 11YRS.
